title: Mountain Bikes – Marin Bikes Global
text: - - $5,199.00 USD - Quake Frame Kit $2,599.00 USD - Enduro/All Mountain Bikes Designed for the rough and rowdy, from wheelies in the woods to racing enduro on the world stage - If you like it gnarly, we've got you covered! - - ALPINE TRAIL XR AXS $5,199.00 USD - - Alpine Trail XR $4,699.00 USD - - Alpine Trail 1 $3,499.00 USD - - Alpine Trail XR Frame Kit $2,149.00 USD - - Alpine Trail E2 $5,279.00 USD - - Alpine Trail E1 $4,559.00 USD - Trail Bikes Like a Swiss army knife only less dangerous and more fun. They say life is all about the journey and we know we're biased, but doing some of it by bike just makes it better! - - Four Corners 2 $2,299.00 USD - - Four Corners 1 $1,249.00 USD - - Pine Mountain 2 $2,399.00 USD - - Pine Mountain 1 $1,499.00 USD - Dirt Jump The Alcatraz is designed from the ground up to take on the skies.
